caller_intent: The caller is following up on a payment plan discussion from 2-3 weeks ago regarding an unresolved insurance audit, seeking resolution.
resolution_steps: Agent asked whether the policy is personal or business.
Caller confirmed it's a business policy and provided policy number WWC3660683 through Wasco Insurance Company.
Agent offered to connect the caller with a commercial team agent.
knowledge_required: Processing payment plans for commercial policies
Transferring calls to appropriate departments (commercial team)
summary: Caller followed up on an unresolved business insurance audit payment plan, provided policy details, and was referred to the commercial team for resolution. The agent initiated transfer to appropriate department.
